      public float getUpgradeCost(boolean buying)
      Gets the value of unlocking a new station, also increments this price each time when called with buying = true
      Parameters:
      buying - whether the call is at time of buying, meaning when it will increase price as well @returns returnCost, the cost of purchasing the station

    • getChefHireCost

      public int getChefHireCost(boolean buying)
      Returns cost of buying a new chef, increasing the price for the second cook bought (as there is a max of two cooks for purchase)
      Parameters:
      buying - whether the call is at time of buying, meaning it will increase the price as well
      Returns:
      output, the cost of hiring a cook
